data.rationale:
This custom HTML::Mason resolver allows for HTML::Mason pages to
    choose different components based on a client's language preference.
    This can be used as a simple drop-in internationalization tool, or
    creatively used to allow web developers use a well structured model
    wherein the structure of a page/application is written in one
    component, while language specific content is captured into
    different (sub)components.
